about_the_game:
Catale is a deck building game that combines CCG and RogueLike.

Breathtaking battle

Strategically place units in a field of 10 compartments, check enemy units, and attack to destroy enemy heroes.

You draw 4 cards for every turn, and after the turn, all the cards in the hand go back to the deck.

There is no shortage of cards! If there are cards left on the deck to draw...

Units attack units facing each other, so you have to think carefully and use your card!

Please, legendary card...!

You won the battle, so you have to take the spoils.

Open the pack and strengthen the deck.

I hope you get a legendary card...!

...there is no golden legendary card, unfortunately.

Deck building that's fun to think about

The way the deck is constructed in Catale borrows from the traditional CCG method.

After you open the pack and get a card, you choose 20 of them.

Should you build a deck out of low-cost cards and make a total offensive?

It will be strong in the beginning, but it will weaken rapidly if there are no more cards to play.

If you make up a deck with high-cost cards, you don't have to worry about the deck drying up.

But because the high-cost card has relatively low performance,

You need to be flexible with your deck according to your win plan.

Because the cards you get are different, the 'best deck' cannot exist.

Have fun collecting cards, and thinking about what cards to put in your deck!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM, OpenGL 3.0 support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Catale is a new type of card game with a mix of CCG and RogueLike. Use units strategically in the field, and attack enemies with spells to win. After opening the loot pack to get the card, make your own deck to face a more powerful enemy...!
supported_languages: English, Korean, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil
